Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of the Three Holy Youth:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/: w~ pisomt n~a~lou n~a~gioc: Cedrak Micak Abdenagw: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers: of The Three Holy Youth: Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego: O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
بصلوات / الثلاثة فتية القديسين / يا ربّ انعم لنا / بمغفرة خطايانا.
